CWEs: CWE-79: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')
description: The function seems to be vulnerable to Cross-site Scripting (XSS) attacks. It directly uses input from an upload field in the DOM and updates the 'upload_wait' element with it. If an attacker can control the value of the upload field, they could potentially inject malicious scripts.
